content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Hello Bo Li, it's nice to meet you. I appreciate your interest in the apartment. The rental price for this 25 square meter apartment is negotiable. What is your budget for this rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. Can you give me your best offer?

I will negotiate with you, but I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

I want to be honest with you, I have no idea about the market prices in New York. Can you give me some information about the average rental prices in the area?

I have some questions about the apartment, such as its location, amenities, and condition. Can you provide me with information about these aspects?

I want to know about the lease term and the possibility of renewing it.

I want to know if there are any additional fees or charges for the apartment rental, such as security deposits or maintenance fees.

I want to know if there is any parking available for the apartment.

If you can provide me with all this information, I will be able to negotiate with you more effectively.
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Hello Bo Li, I understand your concerns. The average rental prices in the area for a 25 square meter apartment can range from 1500 to 2000 Euros per month. However, I can offer you a lower price, depending on the length of the lease and other factors.

As for the apartment, it is located in a prime area of the city, with easy access to public transportation, restaurants, and shops. The apartment has a modern kitchen, a comfortable living room, and a cozy bedroom. It is also in excellent condition, with new appliances and fixtures.

The lease term for this apartment is one year, with the possibility of renewal. There are no additional fees or charges for the rental, except for a security deposit of one month's rent.

Unfortunately, there is no parking available for the apartment, but there are several parking options nearby.

I hope this information helps you make an informed decision about the rental. Let me know if you have any further questions or if you would like to negotiate the rental price.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 1700 Euros per month.

I want to sign a lease agreement as soon as possible. Can you provide me with a draft of the lease agreement for me to review and sign?

I want to know if there are any penalties for breaking the lease early.

I want to know if I can make any changes to the apartment, such as adding furniture or painting the walls.

I want to know if there is a maintenance service available for the apartment.

Thank you for your help.

TERMINATE
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Hello Bo Li, I am glad to hear that you have agreed to the rental price of 1700 Euros per month. I will arrange for a draft lease agreement to be sent to you for review. The lease agreement will include the terms and conditions of the rental, including the lease term, rent payments, security deposit, and any additional fees or charges.

Regarding breaking the lease early, there may be a penalty fee specified in the lease agreement. Please review the agreement carefully to understand the terms.

As for making changes to the apartment, any modifications must be approved by the landlord in advance. This includes adding furniture or painting the walls.

There is a maintenance service available for the apartment, which includes regular cleaning and repairs. Please review the lease agreement for more details on the maintenance services provided.

Thank you for choosing me as your landlord. I look forward to working with you and ensuring a pleasant rental experience.
name: Heinrich Heine
